title: How To Make Tonteki - Midnight Diner Series (Recipe) トンテキの作り方 (レシピ)
description:
Tonteki (トンテキ) is a Japanese pork loin steak dish served in a savory citrusy sauce.  From start to finish in 15 minutes!  Inspired by the Japanese drama – Midnight Diner.

PRINT RECIPE ▶ http://bit.ly/Tonteki

Prep Time: 15 mins
Cook Time: 10 mins
Serves: 2
 
Ingredients:

¼ onion (core intact for easy grating)
¼ cabbage (to serve)
1 tomato (to serve)
2 ½"-thick lean boneless pork loin chops (½” = 1.2 cm)
Kosher salt
Freshly ground black pepper
1 Tbsp all-purpose flour
1 Tbsp neutral flavor oil (vegetable, canola, etc)
Parsley (for garnish)

Sauce
3 Tbsp ponzu
3 Tbsp sake
½ Tbsp soy sauce

Instructions with step-by-step pics ▶ http://bit.ly/Tonteki
